database.execute: DROP TABLE Suppliers

CREATE TABLE Suppliers (SupplierID INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,PRIMARY KEY (SupplierID),SupplierName NVARCHAR(255),ContactName NVARCHAR(255),Address NVARCHAR(255),City NVARCHAR(255),PostalCode NVARCHAR(255),Country NVARCHAR(255),Phone NVARCHAR(255))
